title: Quizzer AI
description: A dynamic quiz app using Gemini API for personalized questions and feedback.
full_details: Quizzer AI leverages the Gemini API to generate unique quizzes on the fly. It features user authentication, progress tracking, and detailed explanations for every answer.
installation:
pip install -r requirements.txt
python manage.py runserver
